intermediate-svg.title: Intermediate SVG
intermediate-svg.subtitle: Getting started animating SVG with Snap.svg
intermediate-svg.description: In this article, we take a first look at animating using Snap.svg
intermediate-svg.author: rob

svg-document-structure.title: SVG Document Structure
svg-document-structure.subtitle: Document Structure, Grouping, and Reusability
svg-document-structure.description: A look at how to achieve reusabability with SVG's semantic grouping and referencing elements. We additionally look at SVG's root element too.
svg-document-structure.author: rob

what-is-svg-and-why-do-you-care.title: What Is SVG and Why Do You Care?
what-is-svg-and-why-do-you-care.subtitle: A look at SVGs most compelling features
what-is-svg-and-why-do-you-care.description: In this short article, we look at some of SVG's most compelling benefits, explain the difference between raster and vector, provide a bit of SVG history, and then finally we finish off with a very simple SVG example.
what-is-svg-and-why-do-you-care.author: rob

svg-for-beginners.title: SVG for Absolute Beginners
svg-for-beginners.subtitle: Creating SVG shapes, paths, and points
svg-for-beginners.description: In this article, I'll try to go over just enough SVG basics to get you prepared for the fun stuff–namely, animating an SVG icon via JavaScript–we'll get to that by the second article in this series. But first let's tackle those SVG basics…onwards!
svg-for-beginners.author: rob
